when calling finalized on a scope - it outputs 1 graph.

yea. i'd like to build a base Tensorflow graph, persist it and have the ability to hydrate it and extend it on a case-by-case basis

body:
@asimshankar it says, we make assumption that one session has one graph:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h#L59

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/08cb0ba5431ef2508c6ca63c498023a84f7b4a18/tensorflow/go/op/scope.go#L55
when calling finalized on a scope - it outputs 1 graph. 

NewSession: accepts a graph:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/08cb0ba5431ef2508c6ca63c498023a84f7b4a18/tensorflow/go/session.go#L51

yea. i'd like to build a base Tensorflow graph, persist it and have the ability to hydrate it and extend it on a case-by-case basis
